questions.question: That is, you can ask the question, is there any locomotion system that is as good as a human?
So for example, diagnosing cancer or predicting the weather, why set humans as your benchmark?
Now, you might say, well, what if we gave it the goal of maximizing its own power source?
Now granted, you solve one problem and there's another one, namely how do we get these people a decent income?
And can you relate to this sense of fun and do you understand the psychology of it?
